title: 港大校長張翔籲各方理性務實解決紛爭　不要再訴諸對抗

replies.msg:
港大校長張翔發表聲明，表示立法會大樓日前發生的暴力事件令他深感痛心，有關破壞行動應予譴責，亦呼籲各方理性而務實地努力解決紛爭，不要再訴諸對抗。張翔說，深信不同意見人士可以文明理性地共處，只要各方主動開展積極對話，社會的裂痕始終會復和，相信各界都願意為了更加美好的香港而求同存異。

2019-07-03 15:15:06

Source: RTHK

科大校長唔跟政府條線

Dear members of HKUST:

It is distressing and heartbreaking to see how the incident inside the Legislative Council Complex played out yesterday and this morning. As pointed out by many, violence should be condemned [被動式無講明自己譴責暴力亦無話事件暴力]. However, observing how things unfolded over the past few weeks, the situation can’t be interpreted as a sign of temporary or single topic discontent only. We need to acknowledge that the protestors, many of them youngsters and students, would want to commit such acts even though they are fully aware of the consequences. While there are possible actions to be pursued by the legal system as well as judgment being rendered by the society, we should discuss the root cause to address the challenges we face. But first and now, appropriate steps must be taken swiftly to diffuse the tension.

It is essential that all parties, public or private, adopt an open and approachable attitude in listening to one another by means of direct conversation. It is difficult but this is what has to be done. Repeating identical statements or persistent confrontation will only bring more divide and can’t serve the interest of our home; and Hong Kong will be the ultimate loser.

Anyone caring for the future of Hong Kong should make an effort to forge such a conversation. As a concerned citizen and an educator, I stand ready to join hands with you to achieve this goal.

Yours sincerely,

Wei Shyy
President
UST > KongU

quote.msg: 仲西過UST校長

replies.msg: 一大已死

含大又贏

各位親愛的同學、同事：
早前離港數天往外地演講，雖然人在旅途，仍心繫香港的情況。一方面擔心學生的安危，另一方面為時局憂心忡忡。我不禁問，香港為何變得如此撕裂和躁動不安？
我相信持續的對抗或暴力不能化解現時的僵局，政府和各持份者應務實地尋求和解的空間，為香港的未來重新對話。
年青的同學們，前路縱有挑戰，但你們必須珍惜生命，同時保護自身及他人的安全。我希望你們繼續守護香港的核心價值，尊重法治精神。
我們的校園在暑假期間仍運作如常，老師、學生事務處和各部門的同事會緊密關注事態發展，並提供適切的支援或協助。
校長
何順文教授
七月二日
